インタフェース Operation

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:

      • findPath

        static java.nio.file.Path findPath()
                            throws java.io.IOException

      • main

        static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        パラメータ:
        args - [a name of procedure] (a property file)
        -l to show the list of procedures
        例外:
        java.lang.Exception - if any

      • getWorkPath

        java.nio.file.Path getWorkPath()

      • getProperties

        java.util.Properties getProperties()

      • writeProperties

        default void writeProperties(java.nio.file.Path path,
                             java.nio.file.OpenOption... options)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method creates a file for the properties as the path.
        パラメータ:
        path - a path for the file (should be *.properties)
        options - if any
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if any
